Data Analyst Job at Transsion Holdings




        
    

        
        Transsion Holdings is the parent company of TECNO, Infinix, and itel, and a leading smartphone manufacturer in Africa and emerging markets. With a focus on innovation tailored to local needs, Transsion also manages accessory, appliance, and after-sales brands like Oraimo, Syinix, and Carlcare

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Data Analyst
Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Coordinate data gathering activities from all states within the assigned region.
	Analyse collected data to identify trends, patterns, and opportunities for operational improvement.
	Develop and propose data-driven recommendations for the efficient execution of regional initiatives.
	Ensure accuracy, consistency, and timeliness in regional data reporting.
	Collaborate with field teams to resolve data inconsistencies and optimize reporting structures.
	Bachelor’s Degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Economics, or a related field.
	Generate and communicate relevant statistics and insights for use by senior management.
	Support the implementation and monitoring of data inputs for Finance(FOL) applications.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel, including advanced functions and data analysis tools.
	Ability to present findings using reports, visuals, and dashboards.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree with 1 - 3 years of work experience. 


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume to: oyeleke.adebimpe@transsion.com using " Application - Data Analyst (port Harcourt)" as the subject of the mail.

Business Development Manager Job at Yuana Terrain Limited




        
    

        
        Yuana Terrain Limited is a Real Estate Development Company Situated in Abuja, Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Manager
Job Location: Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking to hire aBusiness Development Manager iwho will be responsible for driving growth through client acquisition, strategic partnerships, and the development of new business opportunities.
	This role focuses on identifying potential clients, fostering long-term relationships, expanding the company’s market presence, and meeting sales targets in the real estate sector.


Responsibilities
Business Development & Sales:


	Develop and execute strategic plans to achieve sales targets and expand the customer base.
	Pitch real estate offerings to corporate clients, investors, and individual buyers.
	Respond to client inquiries, provide property tours, and follow up through the entire sales funnel.
	Negotiate and close deals, ensuring revenue and profitability goals are met.


Partnership & Relationship Management:


	Build and maintain relationships with property developers, investors, landlords, brokers, and related stakeholders.
	Establish collaborations with banks and mortgage companies to enhance offerings.
	Attend industry events, exhibitions, and conferences to promote the brand and develop contacts.


Market Research & Strategy:


	Conduct competitive analysis to identify trends and adjust strategies accordingly.
	Provide insights into new market segments and geographic expansion opportunities.
	Monitor market conditions, pricing strategies, and regulatory policies affecting the real estate industry.


Marketing & Branding Support:


	Work with the marketing team to develop campaigns, digital content, and sales materials.
	Promote properties using various channels including social media, property portals, and corporate presentations.


Reporting & Documentation:


	Maintain accurate records of sales activities, pipeline, and client interactions using CRM tools.
	Prepare regular reports on business development performance and forecast trends.
	Ensure all documentation related to transactions is complete and legally compliant.


Key Skills & Competencies


	Excellent communication, presentation, and negotiation skills.
	High-level networking and relationship-building abilities.
	Strategic thinking and problem-solving mindset.
	Familiarity with CRM software and real estate marketing platforms.
	Ability to work independently and manage multiple priorities.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Clinikhr@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

We are a diversified and internationally recognized energy company that provides stable and reliable power to all customers by generation and distribution of power while maintaining stringent adherence to OEM guidelines of operation and maintenance. Over the years, we have gathered a diverse clientele all over Nigeria and we continue to grow our portfolio through the provision of reliable services. On 8th April 2016, Paras Energy became the 27th Company to supply power to National Grid in Nigeria and the first privately owned company to supply power under a bilateral agreement to their customers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

	Interested candidates should possess an HND / Bachelor&#39;s Degree in a relevant field with 4 - 6 years of work experience.
	Experience in Admin and Fleet Management is a must
	Good communication (oral and written communication), interpersonal and presentation skills.
	Ability to maintain confidentiality
	Strong attention to detail
	Advanced Excel skill
	Excellent organizational and time management skills.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;careers@Parasenergy.com&nbsp;and copy&nbsp;elizabeth.adeniyi@Parasenergy.com&nbsp;using the Job Position and Location as the subject of the mail.

Admin / Fleet Officer Job at Paras Energy




        
    

        
        
     

            
    

Paras Energy was incorporated in the year 2002. We are a diversified and internationally recognized energy company that provides stable and reliable power to all customers by generation and distribution of power while maintaining stringent adherence to OEM guidelines of operation and maintenance. Apart from power generation and distribution, we can also provide EPC and maintenance services for substations, transmission line and pressure reducing & measuring stations. At Paras Energy, we believe that electricity should be accessible and affordable to all. Over the years, we have gathered a diverse clientele all over Nigeria and we continue to grow our portfolio through the provision of reliable services. On 8th April 2016, Paras Energy became the 27th Company to supply power to National Grid in Nigeria and the first privately owned company to supply power under a bilateral agreement to their customers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Admin / Fleet Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / Bachelor's Degree in a relevant field with 4 - 6 years of work experience.
	Experience in Admin and Fleet Management is a must
	Good communication (oral and written communication), interpersonal and presentation skills.
	Ability to maintain confidentiality
	Strong attention to detail
	Advanced Excel skill
	Excellent organizational and time management skills.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@Parasenergy.com and copy elizabeth.adeniyi@Parasenergy.com using the Job Position and Location as the subject of the mail.

Human Resource Manager Job at Kelina Hospital




        
    

        
        Kelina Hospital is a surgical hospital, with a focus on Minimally Invasive Surgery. Kelina was the first private hospital in Nigeria to do Laser Lithotripsy for Kidney Stones (PCNL, RIRS, 2011), Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy, LRP (2012), and Holmium Laser Enucleation of the Prostate (HoLEP, 2018). Kelina does Laparoscopic Surgery in General Surgery, Urology, Gynaecology amongst others. HoLEP, LRP, PCNL, RIRS are the most common surgeries we do each week.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resource Manager
Job Locations: Gwarinpa, Abuja (FCT) and Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	Lead and oversee all HR functions including recruitment, onboarding, performance management, and employee relations.
	Develop and implement HR policies and ensure compliance with labor regulations.
	Coordinate staff training and development initiatives.
	Provide support and guidance to management and staff on HR-related issues.
	Maintain HR records and prepare regular HR reports.
	Promote a positive work culture and handle conflict resolution.
	Do other HR and Management jobs delegated by Hospital Management Committee and the Medical Director.


Requirements
To be eligible, candidate must:


	Be resident in Abuja or Lagos.
	Have post-NYSC job experience in Human Resources Management, preferably in a healthcare or large corporate environment.
	Be a University Graduate with relevant certification.
	Possess strong knowledge of Nigerian Labour Law and HR best practices.
	Be certified by relevant professional bodies such as CIPM, SHRM, or equivalent.
	Be highly computer-literate.
	Candidates that are lawyers will have added advantage.


Salary
N300,000 per month.
